node.title: 'They've just ditched in the water': Audio captures moment light plane hits ocean off Perth
node.alt: A photo of the wreckage of a red plane on the back of a truck with the propeller tied up.
node.description: Air traffic control audio captures the moment a light plane ditches into the ocean at a popular Perth beach after the pilot reports engine trouble.
node.content:
["Air traffic control audio has captured the moment a light plane ditched into the ocean off a popular Perth beach.", "Two men were about 30 minutes into a flight on board the SOCATA TB-20 aircraft on Saturday when engine problems left them with one of the most challenging tasks in aviation.", "The pilot was forced to ditch the\u00a0aircraft into the ocean just south of\u00a0City Beach at about 3:30pm.", "Remarkably,\u00a0both the pilot and his passenger walked away with barely a scratch.", "", "
A light plane crashes into the ocean off City Beach in Perth.
", "Shortly before the incident, an approach controller at Perth Airport asked the pilot of a plane which had just dropped a group of skydivers near Langley Park to keep an eye on the stricken aircraft.", "\"I can see them there.\u00a0They're very low, looks like they're tracking for the beach,\" the pilot said.", "From about 2,000 feet,\u00a0the aircraft operated by Skydive Australia saw the smaller plane ditch.", "Images from the scene showed the aircraft sitting in shallow water\u00a0as beachgoers looked on.", "One witness said the plane appeared to skip across the water before coming to a stop.", "\"It sounded like a giant tin can hitting the water,\" Amanda Shelsher said.", "\"It's amazing it didn't flip.\u00a0You'd think it would nosedive and flip and roll\u00a0but it didn't, so they're very lucky.\"", "
Wreckage removed from beach
", "The Civil Aviation Safety Authority's aircraft register shows the plane is operated by\u00a0and registered to\u00a0Questair, which is based in Kensington.", "The company's only other aircraft is another SOCATA TB-20, for which it has been the registered operator since 1982.", "", "
The wreckage of the plane was removed from the beach overnight.(ABC News)
", "The crashed plane was manufactured in France in 1984, before being registered by Questair later that year.", "There are 25 other aircraft of the same type registered in Australia, including four in WA.", "After the wreckage was pulled from the water on Saturday afternoon, authorities spent part of the night removing\u00a0it from the beach.", "Photos of the delicate operation show police and contractors moving the mostly intact fuselage along the beach, along with a handful of smaller fragments which had broken off.", "A small crane was then used to carry the aircraft from the sand to a waiting truck.", "It had to be loaded onto the truck bed sideways to limit the width of the vehicle.", "It is understood the plane was taken to a holding yard in Welshpool.", "It is not yet clear if the Australian Transportation Safety Bureau\u00a0will investigate the crash."]
